Name: 发丘中郎将 The Grave robber
About the game: background [/] In the 13th year of Jian'an, Cao Cao was defeated and Chibi suffered heavy losses. After this war, the prototype of the tripartite confrontation was established. In order to resist the sun Liu alliance, Cao Cao ordered general Qiu and MOJIN Xiaowei to go secretly to explore the legendary 'elixir of immortality' and the 'ghost seal' that can summon tens of millions of Yin soldiers. It took them several years to find a millennium old tomb in a deep mountain and forest. After their discussion, they decided to turn back and report the matter to Cao Cao by school captain MOJIN, and faqiu Zhonglang went down to the tomb to find treasure mainline mode [/] collect items and clues in the scene crack the mechanism and move on defeat the enemies you see and absorb their souls [/] escape into fantasy [/] is different from the main line map and uses a separate map. challenge any boss and get a lot of souls. constantly challenge yourself and use the least time to defeat the enemy!
